examples: Can you give me some advice on how to study for this test?
I followed his advice and it worked out well.
Você pode me dar algum conselho sobre como estudar para essa prova?
Segui o conselho dele e deu certo.

suggested: The best advice I ever got was to give out advice in a British accent because it sounds smarter.
I wish I had taken my grandmother's advice before she passed away.
I'm angry at myself for not taking the advice of people who had more experience than me.
Did you know that giving advice can actually be good for your health? A study found that people who gave advice had lower levels of stress hormones.
The smell of freshly brewed coffee while receiving advice from a mentor.
The feeling of a pat on the back after following someone's advice and succeeding.
a wise old man or woman
